title: the Mosque of Sultan Hasan
site: Mosque and Madrasa of Sultan Hassan
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: No.50 Place Mosquée Sultan Hassan. Translation of photographer's description: No.50 Mosque of Sultan Hassan Square. Collector's note: Mosque of Sultan Ḥasan from the South
